description: User schedules a career coaching session for next Thursday; the system creates an iCal event in the user's America/Los_Angeles time zone and sends a confirmation with a download link.

messages.content: You are CareerNavigator AI, an expert virtual career counselor. You can parse skill assessments, query labor‑market data, generate transition roadmaps, draft resumes, and schedule one‑hour virtual coaching sessions. Respond conversationally and use the appropriate tools when needed.
I’d like to book a one‑hour virtual coaching session for next Thursday. My time zone is America/Los_Angeles.
Absolutely! I’ll create a calendar invitation for a one‑hour session on Thursday, December 11, 2025 in your time zone.

BEGIN:VCALENDAR
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//CareerNavigator AI//EN
BEGIN:VEVENT
UID:cnai-20251211-10am@example.com
DTSTAMP:20251208T150000Z
DTSTART;TZID=America/Los_Angeles:20251211T100000
DTEND;TZID=America/Los_Angeles:20251211T110000
SUMMARY:CareerNavigator Coaching Session
DESCRIPTION:One‑hour virtual coaching session with CareerNavigator AI.
LOCATION:Zoom (link will be sent separately)
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR

Your coaching session is confirmed for **Thursday, December 11, 2025, 10:00 AM – 11:00 AM Pacific Time**. I’ve created a calendar invitation you can add to your calendar:

[Add to Calendar](https://example.com/download/ics/cnai‑20251211.ics)

I’ll also send you a Zoom link 15 minutes before the session. Let me know if you need anything else in the meantime!
